name: sounds-like
description: Responds with words that sound like your query.

description_localizations.de: Responds with words that sound like your query.
description_localizations.pt-BR: Responde com palavras que soam como a sua pesquisa.
description_localizations.da: Responds with words that sound like your query.

options.name: word
options.description: The word to search similarly sounding words for (eg: agile).

description_localizations.de: The word to search similarly sounding words for (eg: agile).
description_localizations.pt-BR: A palavra para pesquisar palavras sonoramente semelhantes para (ex: agile).
description_localizations.da: The word to search similarly sounding words for (eg: agile).

options.description: The maximum amount of results to return (max & default: 50).

description_localizations.de: The maximum amount of results to return (max & default: 50).

options.name: starts-with
options.description: Only return words that start with this value (mutually exclusive with ends-with).

description_localizations.de: Only return words that start with this value (mutually exclusive with ends-with).

options.name: ends-with

name: match-word
description: Responds with words that match the word you provide (eg: a??le -> apple, d??? -> date).

description_localizations.da: Svarer med ord, der matcher det ord du angiver (fx: a??le -> apple, d???? -> date).
